Html:
Hi, I downloaded the source and compiled it after I saw that the new gemming system is being introduced.

The Elemental Shaman model does currently not provide a gem template so I thought I could just add a custom one.

However when I add one I can only select gems currently on my own equipment. It seems all Northrend-level gems are currently in the system but for some reason they are not visible anywhere. What am I doing wrong?

Relaunch Rawr. There are all kinds of oddities like that when you start out with no gemming templates, and no gems in the itemcache. If you still have problems, just wait for our new default data files, and for the gemming templates for Elem.

Also, I just checked in a default gemming.
Delete your GemmingTemplates.xml file in the Data subdirectory and relaunch Rawr.
